thread.title: Top Obama Adviser Makes MOST Shocking Statement of the Past 8 Years…
thread.title_full: Top Obama Adviser Makes MOST Shocking Statement of the Past 8 Years…

author: Nickarama
title: Top Obama Adviser Makes MOST Shocking Statement of the Past 8 Years…
text:
Scandal? The Obama administration never had a scandal, did they? 
It was the most open and transparent administration ever , as they were so fond of telling us. 
Anything you may have heard to the contrary is just nonsense… 
From the NY Post: 
“The president prides himself on the fact that his administration hasn’t had a scandal and he hasn’t done something to embarrass himself,” [Adviser Valerie] Jarrett said in an interview broadcast on CNN Sunday. 
Jarrett opined that it was because Barack and Michelle Obama were such ‘good people’ that that ‘resonates with the American people.’ 
Needless to say, Jarrett’s opinion was not received well. 
Tom Fitton of ‘Judicial Watch’ called Jarrett’s assessment ‘delusional.’ 
“The Obama administration has a scandal rap sheet longer than my arm. Between just the IRS abuses, Benghazi, and the Hillary Clinton scandals, this administration was even more corrupt than Nixon’s,” Fitton concluded. 
Not to mention Solyndra, Fast and Furious, the NSA spying scandal, and the spying on reporters. 
If we expanded to cover whether Obama has ‘done something to embarrass himself,’ we probably would still be talking next week. From bowing to dictators to throwing our friends under the bus with the anti-Israel resolution, there’s a lot of embarrassing there. LIKE this article?
